About

CANTINA er et kunstnerdrevet udstillingssted drevet af medlemmer af atelierfællesskabet Corporum. CANTINA er baseret i lokaler på Godsbanen i Aarhus C.

CANTINA is an artist-run exhibition space run by members of the studio community Corporum. CANTINA is based on Godsbanen in Aarhus C., Denmark

Adress: CANTINA. Skovgaardsgade 3, DK-8000 Aarhus C.

Corporum: http://corporum.dk/
fb: https://www.facebook.com/cancancantina
Insta: https://www.instagram.com/cancancantina/
